languages.text: Паскаль издает тревожную бинарную трель. Магос не смеет перечить приказу Вольного Торговца, однако до самого окончания действа покидает мостик и отправляется в недры корабля усмирять взволнованных машинных духов.

traits.locale_text: Паскаль издает тревожную бинарную трель. Магос не смеет перечить приказу Вольного Торговца, однако до самого окончания действа покидает мостик и отправляется в недры корабля усмирять взволнованных машинных духов.

languages.text: Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.
languages.original_text: Паскаль издает тревожную бинарную трель. Магос не смеет перечить приказу Вольного Торговца, однако до самого окончания действа покидает мостик и отправляется в недры корабля усмирять взволнованных машинных духов.

traits.locale_text: Pascal utters an alarmed binary trill. The Magos can't question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the belly of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He doesn't return until the action is over.

Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.

Pasqal utters an alarmed binary trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.

Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.

languages.text: 帕斯卡发出了惊恐的二进制颤音。尽管这位贤者不敢质疑行商浪人的命令，但他还是离开了舰桥，进入了船舱，安抚那些情绪激动的机魂，直到这场行动结束之后才回来。
languages.original_text: Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡发出了惊恐的二进制颤音。尽管这位贤者不敢质疑行商浪人的命令，但他还是离开了舰桥，进入了船舱，安抚那些情绪激动的机魂，直到这场行动结束之后才回来。

languages.text: Pasqal produce una vibración binaria de alerta. El magos no se atreve a cuestionar las órdenes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, pero abandona el puente y se dirige a las entrañas de la nave para apaciguar a los perturbados espíritus máquina. No vuelve hasta que la operación ha terminado.
languages.original_text: Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal produce una vibración binaria de alerta. El magos no se atreve a cuestionar las órdenes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, pero abandona el puente y se dirige a las entrañas de la nave para apaciguar a los perturbados espíritus máquina. No vuelve hasta que la operación ha terminado.

languages.text: パスカルは警戒するようなバイナリックの機械音を口にする。マゴスはローグトレーダーの命令に疑問を抱くことなく、艦橋を離れ、興奮した機械精霊（マシーンスピリット）をなだめるために船底に入る。作戦が終わるまでマゴスは戻ってこない。
languages.original_text: Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.

traits.locale_text: パスカルは警戒するようなバイナリックの機械音を口にする。マゴスはローグトレーダーの命令に疑問を抱くことなく、艦橋を離れ、興奮した機械精霊（マシーンスピリット）をなだめるために船底に入る。作戦が終わるまでマゴスは戻ってこない。

languages.text: Pasqal stößt einen alarmierten binhären Triller aus. Der Magos wagt es nicht, die Befehle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu hinterfragen, aber er verlässt die Brücke und begibt sich in die Tiefen des Schiffs, um die aufgebrachten Maschinengeist zu besänftigen. Er kehrt erst zurück, als die Operation beendet ist.
languages.original_text: Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal stößt einen alarmierten binhären Triller aus. Der Magos wagt es nicht, die Befehle {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu hinterfragen, aber er verlässt die Brücke und begibt sich in die Tiefen des Schiffs, um die aufgebrachten Maschinengeist zu besänftigen. Er kehrt erst zurück, als die Operation beendet ist.

languages.text: Pasqal émet un gazouillement binhaire alarmé. Le magos ne conteste pas les ordres {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais quitte le pont pour se diriger vers les entrailles du vaisseau afin d'apaiser les esprits de la machine qui s'agitent. Il ne revient pas avant la fin de l'opération.
languages.original_text: Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal émet un gazouillement binhaire alarmé. Le magos ne conteste pas les ordres {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais quitte le pont pour se diriger vers les entrailles du vaisseau afin d'apaiser les esprits de la machine qui s'agitent. Il ne revient pas avant la fin de l'opération.

languages.text: Pasqal, endişeyle ikilidilde mırıldanıyor. Magos, Hür Tacir'in emirlerini sorgulamaya cesaret edemese de köprüden ayrılarak geminin derinliklerine, huzursuz makine ruhlarını yatıştırmaya gidiyor. Operasyon sona erene kadar geri dönmüyor.
languages.original_text: Pasqal utters an alarmed binharic trill. The Magos will not dare question the Rogue Trader's orders, but he leaves the bridge and goes into the bowels of the ship to pacify the agitated machine spirits. He does not return until the operation is over.
